holidays.name: National Dog Day
holidays.description: A day dedicated to honoring dogs of all breeds, their love, loyalty, and the joy they bring to our lives.
holidays.origin: Founded in 2004 by animal welfare advocate Colleen Paige to raise awareness about adoption and rescue.
holidays.funFact: National Dog Day celebrates not just pets but also working dogs, including service dogs and therapy dogs who perform incredible tasks!
